event.description: Billy Hamilton lines out to right fielder Stephen Piscotty.
Jose Peraza lines out to second baseman Kolten Wong.
Joey Votto grounds out, third baseman Jhonny Peralta to first baseman Matt Carpenter.
Adam Duvall strikes out swinging.
Scott Schebler grounds out to first baseman Matt Carpenter.
Zack Cozart doubles (1) on a line drive to right fielder Stephen Piscotty.
Scooter Gennett lines out to third baseman Jhonny Peralta.
Tucker Barnhart strikes out swinging.
Amir Garrett called out on strikes.
Billy Hamilton singles on a ground ball to center fielder Dexter Fowler.
Jose Peraza flies out to right fielder Stephen Piscotty.
Joey Votto grounds out, third baseman Jhonny Peralta to first baseman Matt Carpenter.
Adam Duvall called out on strikes.
Scott Schebler called out on strikes.
Zack Cozart singles on a line drive to center fielder Dexter Fowler.
Scooter Gennett flies out to left fielder Randal Grichuk.
Tucker Barnhart singles on a ground ball to center fielder Dexter Fowler. Zack Cozart to 3rd.
With Amir Garrett batting, Yadier Molina picks off Zack Cozart at 3rd on throw to Jhonny Peralta.
Amir Garrett strikes out swinging.
Billy Hamilton singles on a line drive to left fielder Randal Grichuk.
With Jose Peraza batting, Billy Hamilton steals (2) 2nd base.
Jose Peraza grounds out, shortstop Aledmys Diaz to first baseman Matt Carpenter.
Joey Votto doubles (1) on a line drive to right fielder Stephen Piscotty. Billy Hamilton scores.
Adam Duvall lines out to center fielder Dexter Fowler.
With Scott Schebler batting, Joey Votto caught stealing 3rd base, catcher Yadier Molina to third baseman Jhonny Peralta.
Scott Schebler walks.
Zack Cozart grounds into a force out, third baseman Jhonny Peralta to second baseman Kolten Wong. Scott Schebler out at 2nd. Zack Cozart to 1st.
Scooter Gennett flies out to center fielder Dexter Fowler.
Tucker Barnhart flies out to center fielder Dexter Fowler.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Eugenio Suarez replaces Michael Lorenzen.
Eugenio Suarez grounds out, first baseman Matt Carpenter to pitcher Mike Leake.
Billy Hamilton grounds out softly, catcher Yadier Molina to first baseman Matt Carpenter.
Jose Peraza flies out to right fielder Stephen Piscotty.
Pitching Change: Kevin Siegrist replaces Mike Leake, batting 9th, replacing Matt Adams.
Joey Votto grounds out to first baseman Matt Carpenter.
Adam Duvall grounds out, third baseman Jhonny Peralta to first baseman Matt Carpenter.
Scott Schebler homers (1) on a fly ball to center field.
Zack Cozart walks.
With Scooter Gennett batting, Zack Cozart steals (1) 2nd base.
Scooter Gennett walks.
Tucker Barnhart called out on strikes.
Dexter Fowler walks.
Aledmys Diaz lines out to right fielder Scott Schebler.
Matt Carpenter lines out sharply to left fielder Adam Duvall.
Stephen Piscotty flies out to right fielder Scott Schebler.
Jhonny Peralta pops out to first baseman Joey Votto.
Yadier Molina grounds out, second baseman Jose Peraza to first baseman Joey Votto.

Kolten Wong strikes out swinging.
Mike Leake singles on a line drive to center fielder Billy Hamilton.
Dexter Fowler flies out to left fielder Adam Duvall.
Aledmys Diaz flies out to center fielder Billy Hamilton.
Matt Carpenter grounds out, third baseman Scooter Gennett to first baseman Joey Votto.
Stephen Piscotty walks.
Jhonny Peralta strikes out swinging.
With Yadier Molina batting, Stephen Piscotty caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Tucker Barnhart to second baseman Jose Peraza.
Yadier Molina called out on strikes.
Randal Grichuk flies out to center fielder Billy Hamilton.
Kolten Wong singles on a ground ball to left fielder Adam Duvall.
Mike Leake strikes out swinging.
Dexter Fowler lines out sharply to left fielder Adam Duvall.
Aledmys Diaz grounds out, second baseman Jose Peraza to first baseman Joey Votto.
Matt Carpenter grounds out, second baseman Jose Peraza to first baseman Joey Votto.
Pitching Change: Michael Lorenzen replaces Amir Garrett, batting 9th.
Stephen Piscotty grounds out, third baseman Scooter Gennett to first baseman Joey Votto.
Jhonny Peralta strikes out swinging.
Yadier Molina grounds out, shortstop Zack Cozart to first baseman Joey Votto.
Pitching Change: Raisel Iglesias replaces Michael Lorenzen, batting 2nd, replacing second baseman Jose Peraza.
Defensive switch from third base to second base for Scooter Gennett.
Eugenio Suarez remains in the game as the third baseman.
Randal Grichuk grounds out, first baseman Joey Votto to pitcher Raisel Iglesias.
Kolten Wong grounds out, second baseman Scooter Gennett to first baseman Joey Votto.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Matt Adams replaces Mike Leake.
Matt Adams strikes out on a foul tip.
Dexter Fowler strikes out swinging.
Aledmys Diaz pops out to shortstop Zack Cozart.
Matt Carpenter walks.
With Stephen Piscotty batting, Matt Carpenter advances to 2nd on defensive indifference.
Stephen Piscotty strikes out swinging.
